message: I'm excited to offer you the opportunity to purchase this exceptional product for $1200000. This is a fair price considering its value to you, and I'm confident you'll find it a worthwhile investment.
I appreciate your offer, but I'm looking to save as much as possible. I'm willing to pay $1000000 for the product. I think this is a fair price considering its value to me.

I understand you're looking to save money, but I believe the product's value to you justifies a higher price. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I need to make a profit. I'm counteroffering at $1150000. This is the lowest price I'm willing to accept, and I'm confident you'll find it a fair deal.

I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still looking to save some money. I'm willing to pay $1050000 for the product. I think this is a fair price considering its value to me, and I'm willing to compromise to get a good deal.

I understand you're still looking to save some money, but I need to make a profit. I'm willing to be flexible, but I'm not willing to go below $1100000. I'm counteroffering at $1100000. This is the lowest price I'm willing to accept, and I'm hoping we can finalize the deal at this price.
